thread.title: Governor race: No Bryant vs Gray debate
thread.title_full: Governor race: No Bryant vs Gray debate

author: Frank Corder
title: Governor race: No Bryant vs Gray debate
text: Mississippi governor won't debate Democratic challenger: analysis JACKSON, Miss. â€” Mississippi Gov. Phil Bryant says he won't debate his Democratic challenger, Robert Gray, before the Nov. 3 general election. His decision is bound to disappoint voters who wanted to see how Gray, a long-haul trucker with the CB handle Silent Knight, would fare in a side-by-side format with one of the state's longest-serving officials. During an interview Thursday with The Associated Press, Bryant answered quickly and firmly when asked if he would debate: "No, I don't intend to." That decision makes him Mississippi's first governor in two decades not to debate a challenger while seeking a second term. Gulflive Posted October 5, 2015 - 4:51 am YallPolitics.Com now uses Facebook for comments. Log into Facebook to comment here.
